page.title: Thank You! | Marquel Yvette Photography
page.description: Thank you for downloading the Professional Headshot Checklist from Marquel Yvette Photography.

header.subtitle: Your Headshot Checklist is on its way to your inbox.

checkEmail.title: Check Your Email
checkEmail.text: I've sent your free Perfect Headshot Checklist. A detailed guide where I've laid it out step-by-step. If you don't see it immediately, check your spam folder.

checklistPreview.title: Here's What You'll Find in Your Checklist:

items.title: Before You Shoot Questions
items.description: Essential questions to ask yourself before your session.

items.title: What To Bring Tips
items.description: Recommended extra clothing options and accessories.

items.title: Preparing Your Look
items.description: Tips on clothing colors, patterns, and grooming.

items.title: Posing For Headshots
items.description: Proven posing techniques that work on camera.

items.title: Expression Tips
items.description: How to achieve natural, confident expressions.

items.title: After the Session
items.description: Making the most of your new professional headshots.

steps.title: Review the Checklist
steps.description: Read through your headshot preparation guide.

steps.title: Plan Your Look
steps.description: Choose your outfits and prepare your appearance.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Professional Image?
cta.subtitle: Now that you have the perfect preparation guide, let's create headshots that elevate your brand and showcase your professional excellence.

testimonial.quote: Marquel made me look the perfect amount of warm, friendly, and professional. My headshot is being used everywhere and I could not feel more confident. It perfectly captures my personality.
testimonial.author: Sarah Bartlett, CFO
